//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "bastard", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );

	task ( "hold" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/enemy/english/male/hold_position.mp3" );
	}

	dowait ( "hold" );

	task ( "bastard" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/enemy/english/male/got_bastard.mp3" );
	}

	dowait ( "bastard" );
}
